creator: joshrotenberg@gmail.com
text:
As of memcached 1.2.2, there are a few items returned in the 'stats' command
that are not yet in the struct populated by the apr_memcache_stats() call. The
following patches to include/apr_memcache.h and memcache/apr_memcache.c adds the
'evictions', 'pointer_size', and 'threads' elements.

Created attachment 20124
Additions for evictions, pointer_size, and threads stats items.
creator: joshrotenberg@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 20125
Additions for evictions, pointer_size, and threads stats items.
